class.name: Variant
class.description: A class for representing and manipulating variant data types.

constructor.description: Constructs a Variant object with a null value.
Constructs a Variant object with a specified data type.
constructor.param: The data type of the variant.

constructor.description: Constructs a Variant object by copying another Variant object.
Constructs a Variant object with a boolean value.
Constructs a Variant object with an integer value.
Constructs a Variant object with a string value.
Constructs a Variant object with a string value from a C-style string.
Constructs a Variant object with a vector of strings.

destructor.description: Destructs the Variant object and releases any allocated resources.

method.description: Sets the data type of the Variant object.
Retrieves the current data type of the Variant object.
method.returns: The current data type.

method.description: Assigns the value of another Variant object to this object.
method.returns: A reference to this Variant object after assignment.

method.description: Assigns a boolean value to this Variant object.
method.returns: A reference to this Variant object after assignment.

method.description: Assigns an integer value to this Variant object.
method.returns: A reference to this Variant object after assignment.

method.description: Assigns a string value to this Variant object.
method.returns: A reference to this Variant object after assignment.

method.description: Assigns a C-style string value to this Variant object.
method.param: The C-style string value to assign.
method.returns: A reference to this Variant object after assignment.

method.description: Assigns a vector of strings to this Variant object.
method.param: The vector of strings to assign.
method.returns: A reference to this Variant object after assignment.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a constant boolean value.
method.returns: The constant boolean value.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a boolean value.
method.returns: The boolean value.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a constant integer value.
method.returns: The constant integer value.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to an integer value.
method.returns: The integer value.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a constant string value.
method.returns: The constant string value.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a string value.
method.returns: The string value.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a constant vector of strings.
method.returns: The constant vector of strings.

method.description: Converts the Variant object to a vector of strings.
method.returns: The vector of strings.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is equal to another Variant object.
method.returns: True if the two Variant objects are equal, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is equal to a boolean value.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is equal to the boolean value, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is equal to an integer value.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is equal to the integer value, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is equal to a string value.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is equal to the string value, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is equal to a vector of strings.
method.param: The vector of strings to compare.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is equal to the vector of strings, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is not equal to another Variant object.
method.returns: True if the two Variant objects are not equal, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is not equal to a boolean value.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is not equal to the boolean value, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is not equal to an integer value.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is not equal to the integer value, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is not equal to a string value.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is not equal to the string value, false otherwise.

method.description: Checks if this Variant object is not equal to a vector of strings.
method.param: The vector of strings to compare.
method.returns: True if this Variant object is not equal to the vector of strings, false otherwise.

method.description: Serializes the Variant object to a string representation.
method.returns: A string representation of the Variant object.

method.description: Parses a string representation and sets the value of the Variant object.
method.returns: An error code indicating the success or failure of the parsing operation.
